headline: Why Is Marathon Petroleum Corporation (MPC) Among the Best Cyclical Stocks for Economic Recovery According to Morgan Stanley?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Morgan Stanley’s Best Stocks For Economic Recovery: Top 9 Cyclical Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Marathon Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:MPC) stands against the other cyclical stocks. As 2024 approaches its end, the stock market has been through it all. The driving theme […]
